actions.text: Divide the production in proportion to the demands (modify teh distribution files on the CLIO)
Send email to Bordet, Erasme and UZ
Send email to Beta+ and KUL to order the remaining doses

text: Possibility to restore the complete situation...
ACTIONS : Restoring the complete situation under 30'

actions.text: Restart the KIUBE
Delay under 30' needs other actions

text: ACTIONS : Restoring the complete situation under 30' but not completely

actions.text: Restart the KIUBE
Divide teh production in proportion to the demands (modify teh distribution file on the CLIO
If possible send the complete doses for Bordet and Erasme
Send a dose of at least 5GBq for UZ
Plan a second production only for UZ
GAIN : No second transport
Send email to Bordet, Erasme and UZ
Plan a second production
Send email to ISI to ask for a second transport in the morning (check the possibilities) if it is not possible to provide Bordet and Erasme at the first one.
Send email to Bordet, Erasme and UZ

text: ACTIONS : Restoring the complete situation between 30' and 90'

actions.text: Restart the KIUBE
Send email to ISI to postpone the transport
Send email to Bordet, Erasme and UZ

text: ACTIONS : Restoring the complete situation between 30' and 90' but not completely

actions.text: Restart teh KIUBE
Divide the production to teh demands (modify teh distribution file on the CLIO
If possible send the complete doses to Bordet and Erasme
Send a dose at least 5GBq for UZ
Plan a second production only for UZ
Plan a second production only for UZ
Gain: No second transport
Send email to Bordet, Erasme and UZ
Send email to ISI to postpone the transport
Pan a second production
Send email to ISI to ask a second transport in the morning (check teh possibilities) if it is not possible to provide Bordet and Erasme completely in th first one
Send email to Bordet, Erasme and UZ

text: ACTIONS : Restoring the complete situation but over 90'

actions.text: Restart the KIUBE
Send email to ISI to postpone the transport
Send email to Bordet, Erasme and UZ
Send email to Beta+ and KUL to order the start-up doses
